etomica.space

Class BoundaryRectangularSlit

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.space.Boundary
      • etomica.space.BoundaryRectangular
        • etomica.space.BoundaryRectangularSlit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBoundary, java.io.Serializable

    public class BoundaryRectangularSlit
extends BoundaryRectangular
    Class for implementing slit periodic boundary conditions, in which one dimension is not periodic. Selection of non-periodic dimension may be changed after construction.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • BoundaryRectangularSlit

        public BoundaryRectangularSlit(ISpace _space)
        Makes cubic volume with the x-dimension (index 0) not periodic. Length of each box edge is given by default boxSize in given Simulation.

      • BoundaryRectangularSlit

        public BoundaryRectangularSlit(int slitDim,
                               ISpace _space)
        Makes cubic volume with the indicated dimension not periodic. Length of each box edge is given by the default boxSize in the given Simulation.
        Parameters:
        slitDim - index indicating dimension that is not periodic (0 for x-dimension, 1 for y-dimension, etc.).
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if not (0 <= slitDim < space.D).

      • BoundaryRectangularSlit

        public BoundaryRectangularSlit(int slitDim,
                               double boxSize,
                               ISpace _space)
        Constructor for periodic boundary conditions with a slit in the given dimension.
        Parameters:
        _space -
        slitDim - slit dimension (in which PBC is not imposed).

    • Method Detail

      • setSlitDim

        public void setSlitDim(int slitDim)
        Sets the non-periodic dimension to that indicated by the given value (0 is x-dimension, 1 is y-dimension, etc.).
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if not (0 <= slitDim < space.D).

      • getSlitDim

        public int getSlitDim()
        Returns index of non-periodic dimension.

      • updateDimensions

        protected void updateDimensions()
        Overrides:
        updateDimensions in class BoundaryRectangular

      • nearestImage

        public void nearestImage(IVectorMutable dr)
        Description copied from interface: IBoundary
        The nearest image is the pair of atom images that are closest when all periodic-boundary images are considered. If the vector passed to this method is the displacement vector between two points, the vector will be transformed such that it corresponds to the vector between the nearest image of those two points.

      • centralImage

        public IVector centralImage(IVector r)
        Description copied from interface: IBoundary
        Determines the translation vector needed to apply a periodic-image transformation that moves the given point to an image point within the boundary (if it lies outside, in a direction subject to periodic imaging).
        Parameters:
        r - vector position of untransformed point; r is not changed by this method
        Returns:
        the displacement that must be applied to r to move it to its central-image location

      • getIndexIterator

        public IndexIteratorSizable getIndexIterator()
        Specified by:
        getIndexIterator in class Boundary

      • getPeriodicity

        public boolean getPeriodicity(int d)
        Description copied from interface: IBoundary
        Returns true if the boundary is periodic in the given direction (as defined by the getEdgeVector method).
